page.shortlink: api sql namespace table info class clear function
page.description: Reset the contents of the TableInfo as if it had just been declared.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The Clear() method clears out the SQL::TableInfo object as if it had just been created.
page.example: dim TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo TableInfo.Name = "MyTable" IndexInfo.Name = "Primary_Key" TableInfo.Clear() ? TableInfo.Name = ""
